attributes.action: Request for inquiry into contracts awarded by government during covid crisis.
attributes.additional_details: The purpose is to show transparency into the awarding process in order to ensure that the process was fair, and that the goods or services provided were to a satisfactory standard.
attributes.background: Parliament to approve an independent public inquiry into the awarding of contracts, highlighting why tenders were not requested, nor any due diligence was performed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328408
